tool_description: This API predicts the sentiment from a given sentence by positive or negative.
name: Sentiment Analysis Portuguese BR
title: Sentiment Analysis Portuguese BR

api_list.name: Sentiment
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentiment-analysis-portuguese-br.p.rapidapi.com/v1/sentiment-analysis/multi_language"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentiment-analysis-portuguese-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sentiment-analysis-portuguese-br.p.rapidapi.com/v1/sentiment-analysis/multi_language"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentiment-analysis-portuguese-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
